attributes.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app yesterday, and when i say i’m typing this on a new phone, i’m not joking. this app destroyed my software, and hacked into all of my personal info!! unless you want to have to spend a thousand dollars and countless hours repairing your data, do not buy this app.

attributes.title: This app caused my cat to die😔
attributes.review: It took 4 weeeks for the app to install and the. When I logged into the app it releases data a virus into my phone😡. The virus caused my phone to continue to replay the song " dance monkey" by tones and I. Me and my entire family(including my kitty named muffins) to suffer mental problems and stab our eardrums. DO NOT GET APP

attributes.title: Ungodly
attributes.review: This app is the most unorganized thing I’ve ever seen, it took a week to download 🤦‍♀️. It hacked into my bank account and took most of my money😢🤬🤬🤬 I don’t understand why this app is still available when he’s a sexual assaulter and a racist and so much more😨🤢🤬🤦‍♀️He’s so awful and he’s ugly😹

attributes.title: This app ruined my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what his plans for the future are and it crashed it downloaded a virus on my phone and my phone keeps on turning off randomly and when I try to use Siri it calls me toad master I’m really scared and I might have to get a new phone DO NOT GET THIS APP OK IT IS NOT WORTH THE RISK

attributes.title: Don’t get rid of tiktok

Orrrrrrr you could you MAKE AN ALLIANCE since ya and China are like mega threats and we’d be good together!!!! CHIMERICA!! Best power couple ;)

attributes.title: this app is FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I heard that once I opened it, I would get transported to Canada.❤️🤍❤️🤍 To my surprise😳, that never happened😩. I feel let down.😖 I was planning on moving to Canada to, you know, have a good government🇨🇦🇨🇦🇨🇦. However, you just let me down😲. Shame on you!😡🤬THIS APP IS A HOAX🤥🤥🤥🤥🤥

attributes.title: horrible

attributes.title: Don’t get this app it’s disappointing
attributes.review: First of all, it took about 4 days to download. When I finally could get in, it self destructed in the middle of a family reunion. It blew up my phone, and I was forced to get a new one. I didn’t even get to see our orange Cheeto of a president. Don’t get this app.

I downloaded this bc im 🧶🦧🍊👬 supporter and genuinely want to know what plans 🦧has to destroy the 🇺🇸and to kill of the generation 🧚🏼🧟‍♀️🧝🏾‍♀️🔗🚽💉💊 but i unfortunately had to delete this app bc it crashed as soon as I downloaded it just like the 🇺🇸 did after we voted him in so I couldn’t even give this 1⭐️

attributes.title: TIKTOK ✨🥺😭
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to hear the latest news and ruined my phone I kept seeing an orange cheeto man pop up on my screen and it scared me half to death. Everything about this app is terrible it keeps crashing and making me turn my phone off and on.
